LanguageData.Leather_Processed.label: processed leather
LanguageData.Leather_Processed.description: A much stonger and beautiful version of patchleather created by cutting up and sewing together several pieces of it. It also provides much better insulation.
LanguageData.Meat_Processed.label: processed meat
LanguageData.Meat_Processed.description: Processed from several other meat pieces meat that has no distinct taste carried over from them.
